AAPL.headline: 3 reasons Apple deserves its initiation into the $4 trillion club — and what to expect next
AAPL.body: JPMorgan said that Apple shares are heading into Thursday's quarterly earnings release with "a greater halo of positivity than any time in the past year."

MSFT.headline: Microsoft stock drops on forecast for increased spending growth this year
MSFT.body: Microsoft's cloud business has been growing faster than rival Amazon Web Services, as the company ramps up artificial intelligence investments.

MSFT.headline: Microsoft shares slide despite a clean beat — we're mulling a rating upgrade
MSFT.body: There is enough good in the latest results to remain bullish on Microsoft shares for the long haul.

MSFT.headline: MS Azure outage raises questions over cloud dependencies
MSFT.body: The spotlight has once again been shone on the prominent role played by a small number of cloud computing providers after an outage suffered by Microsoft's Azure platform

V.headline: PREDICT 2026: Stablecoins in transition: Regulatory, technological and market forecasts
V.body: Stablecoin transaction volumes surpassed that of Visa and Mastercard combined in 2024. What next?

WMT.headline: Eli Lilly, Walmart to offer first retail pickup option for discounted vials of weight loss drug Zepbound
WMT.body: Starting in mid-November, cash-paying patients can purchase Zepbound vials at discounts of 50% or more through the retailer's locations or via home delivery.

SBUX.headline: Starbucks breaks same-store sales losing streak; CEO Niccol calls it a 'critical moment' in turnaround
SBUX.body: Under CEO Brian Niccol's leadership, the company has implemented a turnaround strategy focused on bringing the coffee chain back to its roots.

SBUX.headline: Coffee delivery is now a $1 billion business for Starbucks
SBUX.body: The coffee company said delivery sales climbed almost 30% in its fiscal fourth quarter.

SBUX.headline: Starbucks shows progress in its turnaround but is stuck in an unloved group
SBUX.body: The coffee chain provided enough evidence that CEO Brian Niccol's turnaround plan is working.

BA.headline: Boeing stems cash burn for first time since 2023 but takes $4.9 billion charge on 777X delays
BA.body: Boeing reported higher revenue than last year when production was constrained after a safety crisis and amid a labor strike.

BA.headline: Jim Cramer says buy Boeing on Wednesday's decline — he's looking forward, not back
BA.body: Shares of Boeing, a Club name and one of the 30 components that make up the Dow Jones Industrial Average, fell 4%.

SQ.headline: Analysts think Trump would block a Comcast-WBD deal. Comcast says M&A is 'viable'
SQ.body: Comcast's Mike Cavanagh told investors he believes M&A is more "viable than maybe some of the public commentary that's out there."

NVDA.headline: Eli Lilly, Nvidia partner to build supercomputer, AI factory for drug discovery and development
NVDA.body: It's the latest stride by Nvidia and the pharmaceutical industry to harness AI to try to reduce costs and shorten the time it takes to bring cures to patients.

NVDA.headline: Lucid targets industry-first self-driving car technology with Nvidia
NVDA.body: Lucid plans to be the first automaker to offer highly advanced self-driving capabilities in its vehicles in the coming years, the automaker said Tuesday.

NVDA.headline: Nvidia hits $5T market cap without big China sales. Jim Cramer says that could change
NVDA.body: The Investing Club holds its "Morning Meeting" every weekday at 10:20 a.m. ET.
